title: Group portrait of two men, including groom on left wearing moustache and dark necktie, looking right towards man kissing smiling bride on cheek wearing headpiece with mid length veil, earrings, light colored strapless wedding dress, floral lace long sleeved jacket, and floral lace overlay on ankle length skirt, holding Bible with ribbons and light colored gloves, standing in interior with window with blinds and floral curtains, possibly for Holsey wedding on Anaheim Street in the Hill District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
